Description: Limestone ostracon with remains of 10 lines of text on recto, one of them vertikal on the right edge and 3 lines of text on verso.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Monastery of St Phoibammon, Location of the Temple of Mentuhotep I.
Bibliographic references: Biedenkopf-Ziehner 2000a / Koptische Ostraka I: Ostraka aus dem Britischen Museum in London (188-91, pls.19 and 20)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (82884) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/82884)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: O.Brit.Mus.Copt. II 18 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
